title: MiO Stix Vape Disposable
summary: The sleek and stylish MiO Stix are disposable vape devices that come in 15 exciting flavors to choose from. Experience premium Salt Nic with Icy Fresh and fruity flavors that will quench your thirst for Nicotine and leave you wanting for more. No hassle...
description:
The sleek and stylish MiO Stix are disposable vape devices that come in 15 exciting flavors to choose from. Experience premium Salt Nic with Icy Fresh and fruity flavors that will quench your thirst for Nicotine and leave you wanting for more. No hassle of filling e-juices or recharging your device again and again, just vape on!
Effortless Vaping – Get a rush of fresh Icy and fruity flavours instantly with on-draw activation. That means, no complicated mechanisms, buttons or draw mechanism, just effortless vaping experience.
Zero Maintenance
– The MiO Stix disposable e-cigs come with a built-in battery that is fully charged and filled with 1.2 ml of 50mg Salt Nic – enough to substitute 20 cigarettes. No refilling, no maintenance, just use and dispose of.
Perfect for On-the-Move Vaping
– The sleek and almost weightless device is easy to carry and discreet to use, making it the perfect disposable vape for your active lifestyle.
MiO Stix disposable e-cigarettes are 100% authentic, brand new and safe to vape.

title: Switch Stick Disposable
summary: DripMore Switch is a disposable pod system that enables you to switch between all of your favorite flavors with ease. These vapes are perfect for those of you who are on the go and don't want to have to worry about changing your coils or batteries...
description:
DripMore Switch is a disposable pod system that enables you to switch between all of your favorite flavors with ease. These vapes are perfect for those of you who are on the go and don't want to have to worry about changing your coils or batteries. DripMore Switch Stick provides you with a wide variety of flavors so you will always have a new flavor to tickle your fancy and with each disposable pod
being packed full of flavors you will never tire of them. The DripMore Switch Stick Disposable are sure to rock your socks off and have you trying every single one of them with just one puff.
5% Nic
BLUE RAZZ

DripMore
Switch Stick
Blue Razz takes the taste of your favorite childhood candy and turns it into a disposable vape flavor that you won't want to put down. This flavor is so authentic that with one puff you will feel as if you've just walked out of your local conveniences store with the best blue raspberry candy inside. DripMore has gotten the blue raspberry flavor down for sure and you won't be able to stop puffing on it.
BERRY

DripMore
Switch Stick
Berry takes all of the succulent berry flavors that have you drooling and turns it into a disposable vape pod flavor that you will want to shout from the rooftops about. This disposable vape truly takes the cake with how on point the berry flavor is. DripMore combines all of the best berry flavors and turns them into a vape flavor you won't want to part with.
GRAPE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Grape i
s the one for all you grape fanatics out there. This vape flavor takes the authentic taste of grapes and puts them into a disposable vape you can take with you anywhere you go. This vape is for sure to have you puffing on it until it's empty.
PEACH ICE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Peach Ice combines the taste of sweet southern peaches with a menthol base to give you a vape flavor that you will never tire of. DripMore has found the perfect balance between sweet and refreshing with their peach ice vape.
PINK LEMONADE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Pink Lemonade is the perfect disposable vape for you if you enjoy a sweet yet tart vape flavor. DripMore has recreated the taste of pink lemonade so accurately with this disposable vape your mind will be blown with every puff you take. Never again will you have to worry about going flavor blind because this disposable vape has so much flavor packed in it will wow your taste buds instantly.
GRAPEFRUIT GUAVA

DripMore
Switch Stick
Grapefruit Guava provides you with the most mouthwatering disposable vape flavor. This vape flavor is sure to have you drooling in seconds with the delicious taste of grapefruit and the juicy taste of guava. DripMore has made a disposable vape that will have you wiping the drool from your mouth from your first puff until your last.
WATERMELON ICE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Watermelon Ice takes the taste of succulent watermelons and combines that with a menthol base to keep you on your toes with every puff you take. This disposable vape flavor is everything you've been looking for and you won't be disappointed in the exceptional flavor it provides.
STRAWBERRY BANANA

DripMore
Switch Stick
Strawberry Banana takes the sweet fruity taste of strawberries and combines it with the creamy taste of bananas to give you a disposable vape flavor that you will be writing home about. This fusion is the perfect balance between sweet and creamy and you certainly won't be able to get enough of it.
STRAWBERRY LEMONADE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Strawberry Lemonade takes the succulent taste of strawberries and fuses it together with a lemonade base to give you a sweet yet tart vape that will remind you of your favorite summer memories with just one puff. DripMore has made the most on point disposable vape transport you back to the best summer of your life.
POG

DripMore
Switch Stick
POG takes the wonderful flavors of passion fruit, oranges, and guava to bring you a disposable vape that will have your taste buds jumping for joy with every puff you take. This vape flavor is so out of this world with every puff you take you will feel on top of the world.
MINT

DripMore
Switch Stick
Mint gives you the traditional taste of mint in a disposable vape pod so you will be able to puff on this wonderful flavor all day long. We all love the refreshing taste of mint and who wouldn't want to have that at their disposal all day long? With the DripMore Switch Stick you will be able to puff on the delightful taste of mint endlessly.
GREEN APPLE

DripMore
Switch Stick
Green Apple takes the taste of Granny Smith apples and turns it into a vape flavor you can indulge on all day long. This flavor is perfect for those of you who enjoy a lip puckering vape juice that has such an accurate flavor you won't believe your taste buds.
CUCUMBER LIME

DripMore
Switch Stick
Cucumber Lime combines the refreshing taste of cucumbers with the sour taste of lime to give you a concoction that will have you coming back for more and more with just one puff. This flavor is unlike anything else you've ever tasted and you will fall head over heels from your first inhale.
MELONS

DripMore
Switch Stick
Melons brings you all of the hearty flavors of melons in one disposable vape pod. This flavor delivers the most juicy melons you will ever be able to find within a vape pod. DripMore has reached for the top and succeeded with this one for sure.
MANGO

DripMore
Switch Stick
Mango takes the taste of juicy mangoes and puts it into a disposable vape pod that you wont want to stop vaping on. This mango flavor is so accurate that you will feel like you have just taken a bite out of a succulent mango with every puff you take.
NICOTINE DOSE LEVEL: 50MG (5%)

title: Sigelei Fuchai T3 Tank
summary: If you’ve been eyeing those multi-coil tanks but were concerned about performance and economy, give the Fuchai T3 Sub-Ohm tank a closer look. The coil heads are named SM2, SM4 and SM6 and support one, two or three coils respectively, but the...
description:
If you’ve been eyeing those multi-coil tanks but were concerned about performance and economy, give the Fuchai T3 Sub-Ohm tank a closer look. The coil heads are named SM2, SM4 and SM6 and support one, two or three coils respectively, but the terminology with these new coils is creating some confusion. Each is actually a dual coil so it’s more like quad and hex coils. We haven’t been able to inspect the coils yet so we don’t have the exact specs but we’ll update this page when we know more about the coil design.
These tanks are top-fill with bottom adjustable air and hold 2.8ml of e-juice. Designed to pair nicely with the Fuchai vCigo or the KAOS, they look pretty typical of most tanks of this design, with a wide bore mouthpiece and a dial adjustment for air. The new multi-coil tanks like the Fuchai T3 produce the freshest, just dripped flavor to date, in a conventional tank.
Capacity: 2.8ml
Diameter:24mm
Height:55mm
Top filling
Bottom airflow

7 x rubber rings
1 x Glass
1 x SM2 (100W) coil
1 x User Manual

is a brand-new portable and innovative Pod System kit with beautifully crafted Zinc Alloy & Resin construction. Working with built-in 950mAh battery and smart AS Micro Chipset, the GeekVape Frenzy is one of the most advanced pod system in the vape market and supports stable and high-performance vaping with multiple safety protections. The GeekVape Frenzy Kit also comes with the new replaceable NS mesh coils to bring optimal flavor and clouds to the vapers. While the GeekVape Frenzy Pod adopts the convenient airflow adjustment and bottom-refilling design for easy operation. Plus the automatic output matching function, battery life indicator and magnetic connection, the GeekVape Frenzy is definitely an advanced pod kit. Get it and enjoy the simple yet wonderful vaping.

description:
Joyetech Exceed Edge AiO Starter Kit Wholesale
The Joyetech Exceed Edge AiO Starter Kit is a sleek device that promises 100% in authenticity. The aesthetics of the Exceed AiO Starter Kit make it an innovative and practical device for your portable needs. With features that make the usage simple and attributes that make it technologically advanced, it's no wonder why it's appropriately called by name.
For starters, the Exceed Edge is a pod system that allows you to change the coil heads as often as you like.  The included coil heads provide very precise flavors while accommodating those who prefer an MTL (Mouth-to-Lung) style. The Exceed Edge is also suitable to operate with high nicotine and nicotine salts. Not to be outdone, the Exceed Edge uses a convenient filling system in which liquid is injected into the cartridge at the side of the device.
The cartridge has a 2mL e-liquid capacity which holds a reasonable amount of liquid for vaping. To add, once the Exceed Edge runs low on battery power, the battery indicator flashes and charging takes place when the device is connected to a computer or a wall adapter via the USB cable.

description:
Aspire Revvo Sub-Ohm Tank

The Aspire Revvo Sub-Ohm Tank is a dynamic, authentic and innovative tank! The exclusivity behind the Revvo Sub-Ohm Tank is that it is equipped with a spring-loaded fill port that is used to fill the tank. Not to be outdone, the tank can hold up to 3.6mL of liquid so you're able to vape for a while before refilling.
The Aspire Revvo Sub-Ohm Tank also comes with ARC (Aspire Radial Coil) 24mm coil heads. These coils adapt a distinct stove-top style system which runs 50 to 100W but is recommended to be used at 80 to 85W. In addition, the ARC coils of the Revvo Sub-Ohm Tank allow airflow to enter the tank by way of a triple-top adjustable airflow method, while making each air slot of the tank capable of fully closing.

is the latest progression of the utmost dependable and powerful Arctic Tank, presenting upgrade attributes such as the innovative Sextuplet atomizers, dual adjustable airflow at top and bottom, and integrated Top Turbine Cooling System for heat dissipation. Horizon has developed its own Sextuplet Coil Head, featuring triple independent chambers with dual vertical coils in each and handles up to a staggering 120 wattage, creating unprecedented heat insulation, airflow delivery and turbulent clouds delivery. In order to supplement this capability, the Arctic has quadruple adjustable airflow slots on its base and additional adjustable dual cyclops on top. Following the hallmark of exquisite design, the Arctic Turbo Tank comes with Top Turbine Cooling System to enhance its seamless vaping experience. An included wide bore stainless steel drip tip synergizes with the entire tank systems, enabling max potential right out of the box. Engineered with top-grade 304 Stainless Steel and Pyrex Glass reinforcement and a 3.5mL juice well, the Arctic Turbo Tank is the next flagship in Horizon's incredible lineup, firmly reasserting itself at the top-tier Sub-Ohm Tank market in an all inclusive package!

title: Eleaf Digital Ohmmeter & Voltmeter
summary: This tester is for testing the voltage of battery and the resistance of the tanks. There are two threading posts on the deck, one 510 to 510 adapter come with this tester. The left port is designed for testing battery voltage; 510/eGo battery can be...
description:
This tester is for testing the voltage of battery and the resistance of the tanks.

There are two threading posts on the deck, one 510 to 510 adapter come with this tester.
The left port is designed for testing battery voltage; 510/eGo battery can be tested directly.
The right port is designed for testing tank resistance; after screwing the adapter on the port, 510 tank can be tested directly.
Voltage/resistance will be displayed on the screen on the left of the deck.
When the device is turned on, the LED display will illuminate. When there is no activity for 10 seconds, the device will enter standby mode and the LED display will turn off.
Once an atomizer or battery is connected to the device, it will exit standby mode and the LED display will turn back on.

title: Lorann Oils Super Strength (Water Soluble) - Super Strength Candy Oil
summary: A little goes a long way with these LorAnn Super Strength candy oils. These vape flavoring oils are water soluble so creating a custom flavor is easy. Enjoy a variety of Kosher certified, gluten-free, and sugar-free, delicious flavors like apple,...
description:
A little goes a long way with these LorAnn Super Strength candy oils. These vape flavoring oils are water soluble so creating a custom flavor is easy. Enjoy a variety of Kosher certified, gluten-free, and sugar-free, delicious flavors like apple, Bavarian cream, cinnamon roll, tropical punch, and more.
Choose from 1 oz, 4 oz, 16 oz, 32 oz, or 1-gallon sizes. These LorAnn oils are priced wholesale so you can stock up on your favorite flavors for less. Substitute extracts by using ¼ to ½ teaspoon of oil per 1 teaspoon of extract. You can also use these oils in chocolates and coatings when you mix with liquified coconut oil or cocoa butter.
Explore PerfectVape’s wide selection of all things vapor!

description:
POD JUICE X HYDE IQ 5000 DISPOSABLE VAPE 5000 PUFFS

Introducing the Hyde IQ Recharge, a new 5000 puff disposable from Hyde, equipped with every possible feature you never knew you needed. Outperforming even the hottest devices on the market, the Hyde IQ Recharge is the first smart disposable, loaded with the most advanced and innovative features to date.
The Adjustable Airflow function not only allows users to customize their draw but also helps to enhance the flavor of the e-liquid. The informative E-Liquid Indicator Light takes the guesswork out of determining how much e-liquid is left in each IQ, preventing those cringe burnt hits! The innovative Battery Indicator Light will let you know your battery status and when you need to recharge while the newly added Type-C charging port makes the charging process easy and convenient.
Although a USB-C Charger is not included in the packaging, Hyde brand chargers can be purchased separately
here
.

HI-DRIP DISPOSABLE

ISLAND ORANGE

Take a trip to a fruity tropical paradise anytime of the day with this sensationally sweet candy vape. Powerfully delicious blood orange and juice pineapple flavors packed into one perfect candy chew.
PEACHY MANGO

Give your tastebuds the ride of their life with a powerful hit of mango peach candy. Every puff unleashes a sweet gush of ripe mango melded with sweet peach and finished with the signature taste of chewy candy.
MELON PATCH

Indulge in the ridiculously delicious taste of the juiciest watermelon candy chew you’ve ever had! Refreshing, yet sugary and sweet, it’s sure to be the highlight of your summer!
NECTARINE LYCHEE

Experience a wave of exotic flavors with our blend of juicy nectarines and sweet lychee.
GUAVA LAVA

Experience the sweet aromatic flavors of guava paired with an eruption of strawberry. Guava Lava is the perfect combination of guava + strawberry! ���������
ISLAND ORANGE ICED

Experience the delicious chewy flavors of sweet blood orange and exotic pineapple, packed with any ice burst of menthol.
DEW BERRY ICED

Enjoy the succulent flavor of sweet honeydew blended with the perfect kick of ripe strawberries, and of course a frosty blast of icy menthol.
PEACHY MANGO ICED

Indulge your taste buds with an icy explosion of ripe, sweet mango and juicy, satisfying peach and experience our signature Mango Peach flavor like never before!
MELON PATCH ICED

Refresh your senses with this powerfully cool and refreshing twist of one the most irresistibly delicious flavors ever created – WATER MELONS.
NECTARINE LYCHEE ICED

Experience a wave of exotic flavors with our blend of juicy nectarines and sweet lychee finished with a cool menthol kick.
GUAVA LAVA ICED

Experience the sweet aromatic flavors of guava paired with an eruption of strawberry and finish with a cool hint of ice! Guava Lava is the perfect combination of guava + strawberry!

Donkey Kahn: A beautiful blend of Strawberry banana with a nice splash of dragon fruit.
Smash Mouth: A refreshing strawberry, cracker and custard mash up that is sure to be your next all day vape!
Guava Kahn: A beautiful blend of Guava with a nice splash of dragon fruit.
Blue Slushee: A refreshingly chill blend of tart blueberries and juicy raspberries. This flavor is perfect for summer day.
Fruit Punch: A summertime favorite, Fruit punch is a bold yet delicious mash up between Hawaiian juicy fruits and your favorite soft chew.
Peach Pleasure: Delicious strawberries, mixed with dragon fruit, followed by perfectly ripe peaches equals perfection.
Mean Mango:
The perfect blend of fresh and juicy mangoes with a hint of menthol.

description:
HYDE ONE DISPOSABLE

This unique device harvests a simple and elegant design. The One differs from other devices as the liquid is contained in a tank versus a polyfill disposable, ensuring the longevity of the coil while delivering maximum flavor for the duration of the 2500 puffs its rated at. Simply remove the rubber plug from the mouthpiece to expose the coil, let it sit for about 30 seconds, and vape!

e-liquid contains nicotine salts found in the tobacco leaf, rather than free-base nicotine used in most e-cigarettes and vaporizers. Together with temperature-regulated vapor technology, this proprietary chemistry enables JUUL to deliver a vapor experience like no other.
Mango -  Rich mango with hints of tropical fruits.
Cool Mint - Crisp peppermint with a soothing aftertaste.
Virginia Tobacco - A taste like rich, unmistakeable American tobacco.
Cool Cucumber - Subtle cucumber with a hint of mint.
Classic Menthol - Traditional menthol flavor with a brisk finish.
Fruit Medley - Peaches, grapes and berries with herbal notes.
Creme Brulee - Notes of vanilla, silky custard and crème brûlée.
Classic Tobacco - Familiar, robust tobacco flavor with aromatic notes.

title: Vaporesso XROS 4 Kit
brand: Vaporesso Vape Coils, RDAs and Pod Systems
summary:
VAPORESSO XROS 4 KIT
The XROS 4 showcases COREX 2.0 Technology and features a new 3mL capacity, top-filling XROS Series Pods. The upgraded COREX tech provides a more intense flavor and a longer pod lifespan. While Pulse Mode offers powerful output...
description:
VAPORESSO XROS 4 KIT

The XROS 4 showcases COREX 2.0 Technology and features a new 3mL capacity, top-filling XROS Series Pods. The upgraded COREX tech provides a more intense flavor and a longer pod lifespan. While Pulse Mode offers powerful output support, the XROS 4 also features 3 output modes and a screen to easily monitor your modes. With the universally compatible XROS Series Pod Platform, they enhance the vaping experience. This new product also features an all-aluminum alloy unibody design, elevating its quality and providing a more comfortable grip.
The XROS 4  is compatible with the entire XROS pod series. The latest XROS Corex 2.0 pods are now available offering top-filling and new technology for optimizing flavor. The SSS tech provides reassurance on preventing leakage.
This kit offers an AXON chip that features a pulse mode to boost power to grant a great vaping experience.
XROS 4 makes a great MTL to RDL kit by offering adjustable airflow by the slide of a button. This 1000mAh kit allows a fast and full charge in approximately 30 minutes and is great for an on-the-go vaper.

1 x XROS 4 Device

1 x Type-C Charging Cable
1 x Reminder Card
1 x User Manual & Warranty Card

title: Vaporesso XROS PRO Kit
brand: Vaporesso Vape Coils, RDAs and Pod Systems
summary: XROS PRO is the first to feature a 0.4Ω pod and adjustable power up to 30W in the XROS series, offering an RDL Pod experience. Crossing the limits to pro experience of excellent flavor, it features AXON Super Pulse mode and COREX Heating Tech...
description:
XROS PRO is the first to feature a 0.4Ω pod and adjustable power up to 30W in the XROS series, offering an RDL Pod experience. Crossing the limits to pro experience of excellent flavor, it features AXON Super Pulse mode and COREX Heating Tech. Crossing the limits to pro experience of refined operation, it features the practical screen and button. Crossing the limits to pro experience of stress-free capacity, it features 3ml top fill pod and 1200mAh battery. Moreover, it's compatible with all XROS PODS for added convenience.
For customized flavor, the ultra-precise power control lets you adjust wattage in 0.5W increments with the 0.4Ω pod. Slide the back button for precise airflow adjustments.
As the first XROS series product with a screen, XROS PRO's display intuitively shows wattage level (for 0.4Ω pod), puff count and battery level. When using XROS pods with different resistances, it will display ECO/Normal/Power mode instead of wattage level.

description:
LOST ART SYNTHETIC NIC SALT E-LIQUID 30ML

30ml
Available in 30mg & 50mg
FLAVOR DESCRIPTION:
Beez Kneez
- An e-liquid that is perfect for the early riser and breakfast food connoisseur, Beez Kneez is a romance between honey oats cereal immersed in milk.
Cottontail Cream
- Cottontail Cream is our interpretation of fresh-picked strawberries and cream.
Gummy Glu
- Gummy Glu is a melted dream of your favorite gummy candies from your childhood all in one e-liquid.
Mystery Flavor
- We all like surprises! If you are tired of predictability or have tried every other flavor, try out this bold e-liquid. Guessing games have never been more fun!
OGB
- The third rocking flavor in the Slotter Pop line, O.G.B. is a swirl of green apple, delicious orange, and blue raspberry candy flavors. If you’re looking for unflinching flavor, this one is for you!
PB Krisp
- This is the flawless portrayal of your favorite peanut butter cereal, swimming in a bowl of ice-cold milk.
Slotter Pop
- Just in time for a hot day on the boardwalk or hanging out with friends by the poolside, Slotter Pop is an iced berry flavor reminiscent of a summer popsicle.
Space Rocks - Remember dreaming about landing on the moon or calling an undiscovered planet home? Embrace a mixture of strawberry and kiwi that is reminiscent of pop rocks and intergalactic travel.
Strawberry Strike
- A candied strawberry bubblegum ready for the big leagues.
The Cut
- This is no ordinary tobacco e-liquid flavor. Our very first tobacco flavor carries a hint of butterscotch and cream, merging classic flavor with new friends. This is perfect for anyone new to vaping to start the transition.
The Grape White
- You’ll never have to endlessly chase great flavor with the Grape White. This e-liquid is an ocean of white grapes with waves of citrus and candied apples.
Unicorn Puke
- A perfect blend of warm summer days with a scoop of rainbow sherbet, Unicorn Puke is for those who love something fun and fruity with a kick.
Ziggy
- As refreshing as a real-life snow cone, Ziggy combines 13 fruity flavors into one insane e-liquid.
Cream
- Cream is a sinfully rich blend of strawberries and cream that can be vaped all day without the guilt.
Grape
- Candied grapes are kissed with a touch of citrus to offer a delicious bite of flavor
Slotter Red
- Deliciously ripe red cherries blended with mixed fruit juices will have your mouth asking for more.
Slotter White
- Sweet white slushies take center stage and will remind you of your favorite carnival treat for a wild ride you’ll vape over and over again.
Slotter Blue
- Take your vape game to the next level with a blast of blue raspberries and enjoy the winning flavor of candied blue raspberries.
Space Iced
- Your tastebuds will blast off to a world of icy mixed flavors that combine strawberry and kiwi with an added sweetness that just pops.

Flavor Description:
Aloe Berry Grape Freeze
A fusion of smooth aloe vera, delicious table grapes, and mixed berries with a hint of menthol for a delightful flavor filled experience.
Blue Razz Cotton Carnival

Blue Razz Pop Freeze

Lemon Bar

Peach Pear Freeze
A delightful mix of juicy peach and pear flavors with a hint of menthol to bring the ultimate cooling and flavorful experience.
Pink Burst Chew

Pink Lemonade

Strawberry Strike
- A candied strawberry bubblegum ready for the big leagues.
The Cut
- This is no ordinary tobacco e-liquid flavor. Our very first tobacco flavor carries a hint of butterscotch and cream, merging classic flavor with new friends. This is perfect for anyone new to vaping to start the transition.
The Grape White
- You’ll never have to endlessly chase great flavor with the Grape White. This e-liquid is an ocean of white grapes with waves of citrus and candied apples.
Unicorn Puke
- A perfect blend of warm summer days with a scoop of rainbow sherbet, Unicorn Puke is for those who love something fun and fruity with a kick.
Ziggy
- As refreshing as a real-life snow cone, Ziggy combines 13 fruity flavors into one insane e-liquid.
Cream
- Cream is a sinfully rich blend of strawberries and cream that can be vaped all day without the guilt.
Grape
- Candied grapes are kissed with a touch of citrus to offer a delicious bite of flavor
Slotter Red
- Deliciously ripe red cherries blended with mixed fruit juices will have your mouth asking for more.
Slotter White
- Sweet white slushies take center stage and will remind you of your favorite carnival treat for a wild ride you’ll vape over and over again.
Slotter Blue
- Take your vape game to the next level with a blast of blue raspberries and enjoy the winning flavor of candied blue raspberries.
Space Iced
- Your tastebuds will blast off to a world of icy mixed flavors that combine strawberry and kiwi with an added sweetness that just pops.

description:
SADBOY SYNTHETIC SALT 30ML

Tobacco-Free Nicotine
28 & 48mg
30mL
70PG/30VG
SadBoy TFN 100ml
FLAVOR DESCRIPTION:
Pumpkin (Limited Edition)
No tricks and all treat with this limited edition flavor. Fall in love with the deliciously spiced taste of pumpkin. It will give you that nice warm feeling of sweet sugary pumpkin topped off with delectable buttery cookie flavors. Enjoy it while it lasts.
Blueberry
Don’t be blue with this sweet buttery treat. Sweetened blueberries are baked with layers of creamy cookie dough to give you a flavor you’ll want to taste over and over again. You’ll be the cookie monster you’ve always dreamed of with Sadboy Blueberry Cookie.
Unicorn Tears
No unicorns were harmed in the creation of this one of a kind flavor. Unicorn Tears by SadBoy E-liquid is a uniquely crafted blend of sweet and savory flavors with a delectable butter cookie base topped off with a hint of citrus. Your tastebuds will experience pure bliss from each inhale to delicious exhale. Add a little excitement to your vaping routine with Unicorn Tears.
Butter Cookie
Life is just better with butter, lots of butter. Butter Cookie by Sadboy E-Liquid is a fresh from the oven crumbly butter cookie featuring a sweet golden brown butter flavor base. This rich tasting baked pastry is rounded off with a light lemon zest to balance the satisfying brown butter taste for a satisfying taste every time.
Shamrock Cookie
Down on your luck? Shamrock Cookie will fix that. Like Sadboy’s Butter Cookie dipped into a refreshingly cool and creamy mint milkshake. With notes of a warm baked butter cookie right out of the oven which gets washed down with a cooling and frosty mint milkshake.
Custard Cookie
Turn that frown upside down with our delicious take on a creamy custard baked pastry. Taste the sweet and satisfying flavors of fresh baked butter cookies topped with layers of rich and creamy custard. Enjoy thick and creamy custard clouds jam packed with baked flavors to satisfy sweet tooth cravings.
Keylime Cookie
The key to flavor is limes! The mouth-watering and tangy citrus keylime fruit flavor is paired with the creamy notes of a buttery golden cookie crumble crust. The balanced combination of golden sweet crumble and bite of keylime sourness will have you always wanting to have dessert first.
SAD BOY JAM LINE
Lemon Cookie
Pucker up buttercup because Sadboy Jam - Lemon Cookie is about to knock your socks off with it sweet lemon jam flavor baked into ooey gooey cookie goodness. This flavor is bound to be your favorite jam.
Strawberry
Get in a jam with Strawberry Jam. Once known as ‘Strawberry Jam Cookie’, Strawberry is a warm and freshly baked buttery sugar cookie flavor topped with a homemade jam spread created from freshly picked sweet summer strawberries.
Blueberry
Jam out with Blueberry. Often imitated, but never duplicated, Blueberry (formerly known as ‘Blueberry Jam Cookie’ by Sadboy E-Liquid) combines sweet blueberry jam flavors with fresh from the oven butter sugar cookies producing a dessert flavor like no other.
SAD BOY FRUIT LINE
Punch Berry
Give your day a punch of excitement with Punch Berry. A well-rounded flavor with berries, tart lemons, delicious raspberries, and tops all that off with a lip puckering sour taste. The perfect combination of sour and Sweet just like you.
Punch Berry Ice
Punch up the volume with Sadboy Punch Berry Ice. Delivers the delicious flavors of sweet raspberry, zesty lemonade, and sour berries with a hint of menthol for an on the rocks taste sensation.
Rainbow Blood
Rainbow Blood is a blend of tropical rainbow flavors that will fill your blood with all of the happiness you’ve been missing. A one of a kind blend of both popular sweet fruits and exotic fruit flavors.
Rainbow Blood Ice
The taste of Rainbow blood for the cold-hearted. Rainbow Blood Ice features a plethora of fascinating fruits made all the better with the perfect touch of menthol! Giving you everything you love about the original Rainbow Blood with an added touch of menthol.
SAD BOY HAPPY END
Blue
Turn blue in the face with Happy End Blue, formerly known as ‘Happy End Blue Cotton Candy’ by SadBoy E-liquid. Blue is a delightful spun sugar confection that will delight your taste buds and bring a smile to your face every time you vape. This delicious flavor provides a sweet and smooth vaping experience.
Pink
We have just the flavor to turn that frown upside down. Formerly called ‘Happy End Pink Cotton Candy’, Happy End Pink is a delightful spun sugar confection, inspired by a carnival favorite.
Imagine vaping a fluffy mountain of sweet red berry spun sky high on a paper cone. This tasty flavor produces sweet, dense and aromatic vapor clouds with a slight berry flavor you'll love
SAD BOY NOLA LINE
Strawberry
Start the day on the right foot with Nola - Strawberry (formerly known as Nola Bar Strawnola by
SadBoy
E-liquid). It’s a tasty vape that blends delicious granola with strawberry and sweet cream to delight your taste buds. This delicious flavor provides a sumptuous and smooth vaping experience that produces dense and aromatic vapor clouds.
Blueberry
Don’t miss the most important meal of the day. Nola - Blueberry, formerly called Nola Bar Berrynola by
SadBoy
E-liquid is a tasty breakfast vape that blends scrumptious granola with plump blueberries and sweet cream to delight your taste buds. This delicious flavor provides a sumptuous and smooth vaping experience that produces dense and aromatic vapor clouds.

*This product contains tobacco-free nicotine*
Flavor Description:
Tropical Nectar
Grasps the light flavors of tropical fruits giving this flavor a nice refreshing flavor.
Strawberry Mango DragonFruit
Captures the delicious flavors of mango, strawberry and dragonfruit for an exciting and refreshing blend of flavors.
Pink Lemonade
A combination of sweet and sour bringing a refreshing lemonade flavor. The inhale carries heavy notes of tarty lemon, while the exhale gives a smooth sweet sensation.
Pear Peach Freeze
A delightful mix of juicy peach and pear flavors with a hint of menthol to bring the ultimate cooling and flavorful experience.
Lemon Bar
Embodying a delicious sweet lemon dessert flavor that will excite the taste buds.
Jewel Mint Ice
Capturing the amazing flavor of sweet mint enhanced with cooling menthol to bring a refreshing icy sensation to the taste buds.
Jewel Mango Freeze
A blend of juiced mango nectar and cooling menthol to allow a delightful and refreshing experience for the taste buds.
Fuji Apple Freeze
Seizes the sweetness of a crisp apple with notes of menthol to allow a cooling sensation that will excite the taste buds. This flavor feels like biting into a cold crisp apple on a hot summer day.
Blue Razz Cotton Carnival
Featuring the sweet flavor of fluffy cotton candy and blue raspberries blending them into a delicious flavor that will excite the taste buds.

Flavor Descriptions:
Donkey Kahn: A beautiful blend of Strawberry banana with a nice splash of dragon fruit.
Smash Mouth: A refreshing strawberry, cracker and custard mash up that is sure to be your next all day vape!
Guava Kahn: A beautiful blend of Guava with a nice splash of dragon fruit.
Blue Slushee: A refreshingly chill blend of tart blueberries and juicy raspberries. This flavor is perfect for summer day.
Berry Blow Doe: Juice raspberry chew in the center of a crunchy blueberry shell.
Fruit Punch: A summertime favorite, Fruit punch is a bold yet delicious mash up between Hawaiian juicy fruits and your favorite soft chew.
Peach Pleasure: Delicious strawberries, mixed with dragon fruit, followed by perfectly ripe peaches equals perfection.
VTR: VTR knows how to standout in a crowd! A colorful sorbet mixed with fruit flavors.
Sweater Puppets: Mango, cantaloupe, and a little bit of honeydew melon.
American Dream:
American Dream is a fruity breakfast bar with a healthy splash of refreshingly creamy milk for an undeniably delectable pair.
Pee Wee Kiwi: A elegant twist of kiwi with a couple slices of watermelon and apple with a pinch of citrus to finish it off!
Hop Scotch: Toffee, vanilla, butterscotch custard is jam-packed and loaded with flavor!
Humble Crumble: This e-liquid is a perfect mix of sweet blueberries, a dash of cinnamon and crispy, buttery, cracker crust.

Take a trip to a fruity tropical paradise anytime of the day with this sensationally sweet candy vape. Powerfully delicious blood orange and juice pineapple flavors packed into one perfect candy chew.
PEACHY
MANGO
Give your tastebuds the ride of their life with a powerful hit of mango peach candy. Every puff unleashes a sweet gush of ripe mango melded with sweet peach and finished with the signature taste of chewy candy.
MELON PATCH

Indulge in the ridiculously delicious taste of the juiciest watermelon candy chew you’ve ever had! Refreshing, yet sugary and sweet, it’s sure to be the highlight of your summer!
NECTARINE LYCHEE

Experience a wave of exotic flavors with our blend of juicy nectarines and sweet lychee.
GUAVA LAVA

Experience the sweet aromatic flavors of guava paired with an eruption of strawberry. Guava Lava is the perfect combination of guava + strawberry! ���������

Experience the delicious chewy flavors of sweet blood orange and exotic pineapple, packed with any ice burst of menthol.
DEW BERRY ICED

PEACHY MANGO ICED

Indulge your taste buds with an icy explosion of ripe, sweet mango and juicy, satisfying peach and experience our signature Mango Peach flavor like never before!

Refresh your senses with this powerfully cool and refreshing twist of one the most irresistibly delicious flavors ever created – WATER MELONS.
NECTARINE LYCHEE ICED

Experience a wave of exotic flavors with our blend of juicy nectarines and sweet lychee finished with a cool menthol kick.
GUAVA LAVA ICED

description:
50/50 PG/VG
Available in 24mg, 50mg
30mL Chubby Unicorn with a Child-Resistant Cap
Best for Low Watt System/Pod System
Watermelon Cucumber Chilled from the Pixy Series is a go-to choice for that vape-enthusiast who is looking for a new unique flavor with a cooling twist. Mouthwatering watermelon with a refreshing hint of cucumber with a cool menthol finish. An e-liquid flavor that both new & seasoned vape enthusiasts will enjoy! Also available in a freebase liquid variant.
Mango Lime CHILLED is a mouthwatering taste of tropical mango candy mixed with tart citrus lime with a refreshing menthol hit.
On inhale, you will experience the sweetness of ripe mango, blended with the tartness from the juicy lime, all served up chilled. The perfect vape for enthusiasts of candy flavors.
A CHILLED salt nicotine variant of the Sour Green Apple from the Pixy series, that compliments the sour green apple candy flavor with a menthol finish. The sweet and sour tones from the green apple candy on inhale, are balanced out with an icy cooling sensation from the menthol on exhale.

summary:

description:
50/50 PG/VG
Available in 24mg, 50mg
30mL Chubby Unicorn with a Child-Resistant Cap
Best for Low Watt System/Pod System
This combination of watermelon and cucumber would make you forget that you were vaping on a candy e-liquid flavor. Watermelon Cucumber by It's Pixy is a go to choice for those vape-enthusiast who are looking for a new unique flavor. On the inhale you will experience a refreshing burst of watermelon with just the right after-tone of cucumber, finished off with that familiar Pixy flavor.
We decided to add a little tropical flair with making this e-liquid flavor. Mango Lime by It's Pixy is the perfect twist of sweet and tart. On the inhale, you will experience the sweetness of a ripe mango mixed with the tartness from a juicy lime.
Sour Green Apple by It's Pixy is the perfect e-liquid to satisfy any candy cravings. The sourness from the tart green apple is balanced with the sugar from the candy flavor tone. On the inhale, expect a rush of sour tart green apple while on the exhale, expect a nice sugar candy balance. This juice is perfect for those vape-enthusiast who are looking for the next sour green apple candy vape!

title: TWIST Premium E-Liquid 60ml 2pk
summary:
Pink No. 1 (formerly known as Pink Punch Lemonade)
A delicious flavor that features lemon extracts, which brings to mind your favorite summertime drink.
 
Red No. 1 (formerly known as Watermelon Madness)
This is a unique e-liquid that delivers...
description:
Pink No. 1 (formerly known as Pink Punch Lemonade)

A delicious flavor that features lemon extracts, which brings to mind your favorite summertime drink.
Red No. 1 (formerly known as Watermelon Madness)

This is a unique e-liquid that delivers an amazing flavor of pure and sweet red watermelons.
Green No. 1 (formerly known as Honeydew Melon Chew)

Flavor extracts of sweet honeydew melons and juicy cantaloupes combine to create a delicious e-liquid taste.
Blend No. 1 (formerly known as Tropical Pucker Punch)

Your taste buds will get an amazing punch of flavor from the exotic tropical fruit extracts, which are blended to perfection.
Purple No. 1 (formerly known as Berry MedleyLemonade)

Blueberry fruit extracts are mixed with lemon flavoring to produce a unique and memorable burst of flavor.
Pink 0° (formerly known as Iced Pink Punch)

Pink lemon extracts inspired by a favorite summertime drink gets a punch of fruit flavors and menthol for a chilled effect.
Crimson No. 1 (formerly known as Strawberry Crush)

Vine-ripe strawberry flavors are perfectly mixed with lemon extracts to create a dazzling e-liquid taste like no other.
Tobacco Platinum No. 1

Full-bodied flavor of tobacco is expertly mixed and gives a full taste of sweet tobacco.
Tobacco Gold No. 1

Medium-bodied tobacco flavor is mild yet complex and sweet to provide a satisfying taste.
Tobacco Silver No. 1

Light-bodied flavor of tobacco is perfect for tobacco lovers who want just a hint taste of tobacco balanced with a sweet finish.
Menthol No. 1

Menthol flavors are balanced to perfection to produce a one of a kind e-liquid.
Chilled Remix (formerly known as Chilled Melon Remix)

Keep your mouth watering and taste buds tingling with this blend of sweet watermelon and cool menthol.
Cocktail Blend (formerly known as Fruit Cocktail Blend)

The flavor of sweet lemon citrus when you inhale slowly gives way to reveal a cocktail of flavors that blend peach, kiwi, and pomegranate when you exhale.
Frosted Amber (formerly known as Frosted Sugar Cookie)

A light and airy, almost cake-like confection, is topped with warm vanilla drizzle and sprinkled with candied sweetness for good measure.
Banana Amber (formerly known as Banana Oatmeal Cookie)

A mix of warm and chewy oatmeal cookie is loaded with fresh and creamy bananas to give your tastebuds a fresh from the oven tasting experience.
Berry Amber (formerly known as Strawberry Honey Graham Cookie)

Inhale the taste of delicious strawberry jam, slathered over a flavorful graham cracker, and topped with a golden honey drizzle.
Purple Grape (formerly known as Grape Berry Mix)

Mixed berry flavors are expertly blended with the sweet taste of grape to create an unforgettable e-liquid that your palate will never forget.
Yellow Peach (formerly known as Peach Blossom Lemonade)

Vape sweet ripe peaches, blended with freshly squeezed lemonade. Peach Blossom is the perfect mixture of tangy and sweet, it’s every peach loving vaper’s treat!
Purple Berry (formerly known as Pom Berry Mix)

The unique and exciting combination of tart pomegranate and fresh blueberries produce a purple berry mix like no other.
Sour Red (formerly known as Sweet & Sour)

An amazing blend of watermelon, with a subtle sour taste that adds a delightful and enjoyable sweet kick and tang with every hit.
Wild Red (formerly known as Wild Watermelon Lemonade)

Sweet watermelon and tart lemonade is sure to make your taste buds go wild.
White Grape (formerly known as The Grape White)

This e-liquid is an ocean of white grape with waves of citrus and sweet candied apples.
Space No. 1 (formerly known as Space Rocks)

Embrace an out of this world mixture of strawberry and kiwi that pops and rocks. This otherworldly vape will excite your taste buds and blast you off to another level of sweet flavor.
White No. 1 (formerly known as Bearhemian White Gummy)

A delightfully tasty white pineapple gummy flavor, with a hint of sour undertones, this chewy treat will lay bear a delightful flavor experience that you’ll never forget.
Rainbow No. 1 (formerly known as Sour Rainbow)

A taste of this rainbow is a mash up of colorful fruit flavors with a burst of sour taffy at the finish.

summary:

FLAVORS HAVE BEEN UPDATED 2020
BLOOD ORANGE MANGO (BLOOD ORANGE SNOW CONE)
Set out toward the bold flavors of this refreshing snow cone bursting with tangy mango, sweet blood orange, tart...
description:
COASTAL CLOUDS PREMIUM E-LIQUID 60ML
(0mg/3mg/6mg)
FLAVORS HAVE BEEN UPDATED 2020
BLOOD ORANGE MANGO (BLOOD ORANGE SNOW CONE)
Set out toward the bold flavors of this refreshing snow cone bursting with tangy mango, sweet blood orange, tart lemon and zesty lime.
MANGO BERRIES
Grab the refreshing combination of local tropical mango blended with splashes of berries.
APPLE PEACH STRAWBERRY
Experience waves of flavor from fresh apples, peaches and strawberries.
MELON BERRIES
Stay fresh with this thirst-quenching blend of watermelon, strawberries, cantaloupe and honeydew.
CITRUS PEACH (SUGARED NECTARINE)
Head to the coast of California for freshly picked, sugary sweet and juicy nectarines.
PASSION FRUIT ORANGE GUAVA
Escape to the islands for the fresh flavors of passion fruit, orange and guava.
BLUEBERRY BANANA (BLUEBERRY BANANA MUFFIN)
Start your morning with a buttery blueberry and banana muffin from the coastal corner bakery.
LEMON MERINGUE (LEMON MERINGUE PIE)
Venture out for a slice of refreshingly tart and subtly sweet lemon meringue pie.
MAPLE BUTTER
Head to the wooded northern coasts to sample the sticky, sweet stack of warm maple syrup pancakes.
PINEAPPLE GUAVA (GUAVA PUNCH)
Feel the ocean breeze while enjoying a cool glass of freshly juiced guava, mango and pineapple.
BLUEBERRY LIMEADE
Refresh in a taste of the tropics with homemade limeade infused with a burst of blueberries.
PINK LEMONADE
Chill out with refreshingly sweet glass of pink lemonade, a summertime favorite.
PEACH TEA
Relax in the summer breeze with sweet and juicy peach nectar with a splash of refreshing iced tea.
STRAWBERRY PINEAPPLE COCONUT (STRAWBERRY DAIQUIRI)
Indulge in the island life with a frosty blend of sugared strawberries, sweet coconut and a hint of golden pineapple.
TOBACCO (CUBAN)
Kick back and relax with the rich and earthy aromas that come only from authentic Cubans.
TROPICAL LEMONADE (PAPAYA PUNCH)
Chase the smooth, ripened mix of fruity papaya and mango with splashes of citrusy lemon and lime.
LEMON RASPBERRY (THE TRAVELER)
Follow your wanderlust with a refreshing Italian ice bursting with sweet blood orange, tropical mango and tart lemon.
WATERMELON CREAM (THE ABYSS)
Submerge yourself in summer with a juicy and mouth-watering watermelon salt water taffy.
STRAWBERRY CREAM (THE VOYAGE)
Embark on a fantastic voyage with a warm crunch berry rice crispy treat covered in gooey marshmallow.
*Flavor details are the same but with MENTHOL for all ICE flavors.

JUICE HEAD E-LIQUID

description:
JUICE HEAD E-LIQUID
Juice Head is a relatively new e-liquid line, which brings you luscious fruity vape liquids. Although this brand has only been around for some time, it has already made a mark in the industry.
Juice Head is based in Southern California. The company's e-liquids are made in a medical-grade, ISO7-certified lab. The company follows strict procedures during its manufacturing process to bring you only the best vape juice blends.
Juice Head currently has five vape juice flavors on the market - Blueberry Lemon, Pineapple Grapefruit, Pear, Watermelon Lime, and Strawberry Kiwi. All these e-liquids come in 100ml bottles and are available with either 0mg, 3mg or 6mg of nicotine.
Juice Head also offers nicotine salt versions of some of its e-liquids. All the blends are guaranteed to delight your taste buds and invigorate your senses.

title: Shijin Vapor Premium E-Liquid 100ml
summary:
Dragon Cloud: 
Nothing beats the smell of freshly baked Cinnamon Rolls glazed over in icing, but we took Cinnamon Buns one step further by topping it with a decadent creamy Vanilla Ice Cream. Dragon Cloud is the perfect E-Juice for vapers who enjoy...
description:
Dragon Cloud:
Nothing beats the smell of freshly baked Cinnamon Rolls glazed over in icing, but we took Cinnamon Buns one step further by topping it with a decadent creamy Vanilla Ice Cream. Dragon Cloud is the perfect E-Juice for vapers who enjoy a nice hot savory vape; with the bold flavors of Cinnamon balanced out with the sweetness from the frosting and the creaminess from the Vanilla Ice Cream, It is the perfect juice to satisfy any sweet tooth cravings.
Phoenix Tears:
One of the original creations from Shijin Vapor's lab even better, Phoenix Tears is a bold and complex E-Juice flavor that will appeal to any vape enthusiast who enjoys vaping Custards, Creams, savories and desserts. Right from the inhale, you would be hit with the rich taste of a Snicker doodle Cookie filled with just the right amount of decadent Vanilla Custard and that is not the end of it, just for that added special touch, we finished it off with a dollop of Strawberry Whipped Cream.
Tigers Milk:
Peaches and mangoes perfectly infused to create a delicious slushy treat.
Tortoise Blood:
Stared from humble beginnings and quickly rose to become one of the leading Blue Raspberry, Green Apple Sherbet flavors in the vape industry. On the inhale, you get a nice mellow tone of crisp Green Apples. After your taste buds get hit with Green Apple you will then experience a combination of Blue Raspberry and creamy Sherbet. This complex flavor is the perfect all-day vape; it's balanced flavor profile makes this E-Juice not too sweet but sweet enough to satisfy any vaper looking for a nice refreshing fruit flavor.
Tortoise On Ice:
From the makers of Tortoise Blood and Tortoise on the Rocks, our newest rendition, Tortoise on Ice will satisfy any vape enthusiast who are into fruit flavored Menthol's. Even with the noticeable Menthol kick with each inhale, you will still have the full flavored experience of the Green Apple - Blue Raspberry Sherbet that our Shijin Vapor supporters have grown to know and love over the years. Tortoise on Ice was the final Tortoise Blood E-Juice rendition to complete what we call "The Tortoise Trio"
Tortoise On The Rocks:
Imagine Tortoise Blood but with a twist! We decided to have a little fun with our E-Juice recipe and added a little something that would nicely complement the Green Apple and Blue Raspberry that is in our original Tortoise Blood. Then came the idea and creation of Tortoise On The Rocks, which has the same Green Apple and Blue Raspberry flavor Shijin Vapor fans have grown to know and love. However, we decided to add a touch of Spearmint and Bubblegum to make it a nice refreshing vape that is not too overly heavy on the sweetness, fruit, Spearmint or Bubblegum. Making it a nicely balanced all-day vape .

summary:

The Bear features a 510 thread and works with most oil or extract cartridges, and the Lookah 510 wax carts, so it is a...
description:
LOOKAH BEAR 510 BATTERY
*Tank/cartridge not included
package_contents_description:
1 x Bear 510 Vape Battery.
View All
Close
key_features_description:
510 thread
500mAh Battery
USB Type-C
Adjustable Voltage
The Bear features a 510 thread and works with most oil or extract cartridges, and the Lookah 510 wax carts, so it is a versatile option for vapers of all levels.
The Bear vape battery delivers smooth and satisfying hits with every use. It has a resistance range of 0.7-5 Ohm and three preset voltages, 3.2V, 3.6V, and 3.9V. These voltages display through an LED on the Bear's cute face, which lights green, blue, or purple to show the setting.
Despite its compact size, it has a 500mAh battery capacity, enough charge for a full day of use.
It has a USB Type C charging port and four battery indicator lights in the back of its head, so you will always know when it is fully charged and ready to go.
How to Use the Lookah Bear
This Lookah vape pen has a single-button function that switches it on/off and adjusts the voltage.
Press the power button, Located where the Bear's nose would be, five times in quick succession to turn the vape battery on/off.
The LED will blink three times to acknowledge it's now active.
The color of the LED will correspond to the voltage setting of the device.
Changing the variable voltage
Double-tap the power button to switch between the three voltage settings.
3.4V displays as a green LED
3.6V displays as a Blue LED
3.9V displays as a Purple LED
Vaping with the Bear
The Lookah Bear is not draw-activated, so you must press and hold the button while vaping.
Once the voltage is set, press and hold the power button to vape for up to 10 seconds.
After 10S, the screen will flash five times, and the device will switch back to standby.
Charging the Lookah Bear
On the side of the vape pen is a USB Type-C charging port. Connect any standard type C USB charging cable to this and attach the other end of the cable to a USB charging port.
When charging, the battery indicator lights on the back of the head will pulse. The LED light on the face will pulse red.
Each segment indicates 25% of the charge. After that level of charge is reached, the light will remain solid. When all the lights remain lit, the device is fully charged. The LED light on the face will show blue.
1 solid battery light = 25%
2 solid battery lights = 50%
3 solid battery lights = 75%
4 solid battery lights = 100%

The GZ2 is compatible with all G & G2 Coils

title: Yocan Lux MAX Battery
summary:
Yocan LUX Max
Cranking up the battery capacity, Yocan released a device packed with a 900mAh battery capacity. For those who follow the brand, the 900mAh battery pack are often found on Yocan’s range-topping products like the newly-released Yocan...
description:
Yocan LUX Max

Cranking up the battery capacity, Yocan released a device packed with a 900mAh battery capacity. For those who follow the brand, the 900mAh battery pack are often found on Yocan’s range-topping products like the newly-released Yocan Uni Pro Plus Box Mod and the upcoming Yocan ARI Plus Dab Pen Battery. The larger battery capacity does justice to the “Max” moniker Yocan has given to this vape pen battery.
Like the abovementioned Yocan LUX Plus, the Yocan LUX Max allows for longer sessions and more of the Yocan LUX’s higher voltage settings. Owners will get to push the pace by vaporizing their oils or concentrates at a higher temperature profile for an extended amount of time. That said, the Yocan LUX Max makes for a great device for both medical consumers (who want a vaporizer battery they can rely on with a longer battery life) and for recreational consumers (who are after the potent effects of their favorite herbs and extracts). Similarly, it will definitely appease not only those who use the Yocan LUX Max for personal use and for those who plan to bring the Yocan LUX Plus to group sessions.
Charging the battery has also been upgraded. Unlike other devices from Yocan that still use the dated — yet reliable — micro-USB charging technology. The Yocan LUX Max has USB Type-C charging technology which means that the Yocan LUX Max has a more updated charging system technology-wise. USB Type-C can charge faster than micro-USB, meaning that the owners of the Yocan LUX Max will not have to wait long before they get to use their vape battery. Charging time is significantly reduced making it a more appealing option for those who are always on-the-go. Additionally, some claim that USB Type-C charging also has a more stable power deliver and can somehow prevent battery damage from inconsistent power delivery prevalent on older battery charging technologies. On that one, one can expect the Yocan LUX Max to have a longer lifespan compared to other vaporizer batteries that use dated charging systems. Plus, there’s a fat chance you have a USB Type-C charging cable lying around.
In terms of size, the Yocan LUX Max measures 106.6mm or about 4.19 inches. It’s taller than the Yocan LUX Plus and despite the larger body actually defeating the purpose of concealment (since the cartridge will further extend the battery's height), its beefier exterior actually serves as a good canvas for the beautiful colors of the device. The Yocan LUX Max can be had in either safe hues like Black and Silver, or loud and fun shades such as Yellow, Green, Teal, and Purple. The new colorways of the Yocan LUX Max are also available on the aforementioned Yocan LUX Plus. They complement the luxurious palette of the original Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery which includes Black, Silver, Red, Gold, and Blue.
Overall, if you need a cartridge battery that not only packs a powerful punch but also comes in cool colors, then the Yocan LUX Max is what you should be looking for.

title: Uwell Caliburn X Kit
brand: Uwell Vape Tanks, Coils, Pod System & Kits
summary:
UWELL CALIBURN X KIT
CALIBURN X is an upmarket new product of the CALIBURN series. Featured with output power and airflow adjustment functions, two drawing ways, and an OLED screen, CALIBURN X is a multifunctional pod system with a compact body...
description:
UWELL CALIBURN X KIT

CALIBURN X is an upmarket new product of the CALIBURN series. Featured with output power and airflow adjustment functions, two drawing ways, and an OLED screen, CALIBURN X is a multifunctional pod system with a compact body. UWELL’s Pro-FOCS flavor adjustment technology brings a unique advantage to CALIBURN X, giving you an authentic flavor. Choose the CALIBURN X if you take practicality and aesthetics into your consideration.
LARGE CAPACITY, LONG ENDURANCE
With a large 850mAh battery and a 3 ml e-liquid capacity, CALIBURN X will provide you with more than one day’s vaping time. Vapers do not need to worry about frequent charging and refilling.
LARGE SCREEN ON COMPACT BODY
The OLED screen on the device displays battery life, output power, voltage, coil resistance, and puffs. The visualization of data and operation is practical and user-friendly.
INTELLIGENT FIRING CHANNEL DETECTION
Draw or press the fire button to vape. The button firing can start and stop the vaping process immediately and precisely.
CONVENIENT AIRFLOW ADJUSTMENT
The device’s outer case airflow adjustment valve is convenient for vapers to control airflow. There is no need to remove the pod to operate.
COMPATIBLE WITH G SERIES COILS
The device is compatible with CALIBURN G series coils.
Multiple coils combine well with the adjustable strong power, providing rich vaping experiences.
STAMPING FORMING OF ALUMINUM ALLOY
Stamping forming of the aluminum alloy makes the device durable and smooth, giving you a comfortable grip.
TYPE-C CHARGING CABLE
The pack includes a Type-C charging cable. It adopts 5V/2A fast charging which is convenient and time-saving.

title: Yocan LUX Battery
summary: FEATURES Alloy Body Design510-Threaded Connection400mAh BatteryVariable Voltage SettingsPre-Heat Setting As the name suggests, it’s a 510-threaded battery that accepts a wide variety of coils and cartridges without asking owners and consumers to go...
description:
PEN-STYLE ALLOY BODY

Yocan used an alloy body in building the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery. Alloy is a material used on most premium devices because of its properties. One, it’s tough and durable which means that the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery will not easily break compared to other vaporizers that uses hard plastic body. Alloy is also lightweight so using this material on the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery can make it a better option when you’re looking for an on-the-go vaporizer. Having a lightweight device means that you will not have to be bothered by the bulk and the weight which can make traveling with a vaporizer uncomfortable.
The alloy body also ensures that it will last longer compared to other vaporizers that has been built using weaker materials. Yocan knows that its patrons invest on their vaporizers and wish to get the most out of them. That’s why they ensured that the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery will give them their money’s worth.
VARIABLE VOLTAGE SETTING

Knowing well the needs of its customers, Yocan fitted the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery with a variable voltage setting which can be toggled by twisting the tip of the device. Changing the voltage level this way eliminates the learning curve as the actual temperature profiles are displayed on the edge of the dial. Beginners will no longer have to guess the temperature level nor remember what color stands for what temperature level. This makes the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery a great device not only for beginners but also for experienced consumers who simply want to use a straightforward vaporizer. It may even be a great choice for medicating patients as it takes the problem of memorizing color codes and button combinations which may confuse the consumer. When you’re using your vaporizer to medicate, you don’t want something that makes your sessions less productive. With visible guides and easy to understand procedures, the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery might be one the best vape batteries on the market today.
The available temperature settings are from 1.8 volts to 4.2 volts which gives owners and consumers a wide variety of temperature levels to choose from. Ideally, the lower temperature levels will give you a smoother vapor production that packs more flavor than potency. Conversely, a higher temperature profile allows you to get more potent hits with the results kicking in faster.
You can also use the temperature level to help you conserve battery. Typically, the higher you set the voltage, the more power it consumes and vice versa.
Speaking of which...
400MAH BATTERY

The Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery is fitted with a decent 400mAh battery capacity. It's not much compared to Yocan’s other models but it’s enough for a few hours of vaping, especially when consuming oils. The battery can be charged using a micro USB cable which means that you can use your compatible phone charger with it. As long as your device uses the same cable, you might not need to carry around another cable to recharge the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery.
It's a lightweight device which means that it will generally sustain light and short sessions so heavy users might need to plug the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery in once or twice a day to satisfy their needs.
To help conserve battery when used, Yocan equipped the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery with a pre-heat function which heats the materials in your coils and cartridges without reaching vaping temperature. This means that the oils and wax concentrates will only be heated to melt it but not to vaporize its active ingredients.
It also has a 15-second cut off feature which automatically shuts down power from the battery to the cartridge or coil. This also helps preserve and conserve battery while doubling as a safety feature to prevent misfires and overheating.
WIDE ATOMIZER COMPATIBILITY

Unlike other Yocan products like the UNI Box Mod Series, the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery has an open cartridge setting. There are no chambers that may limit your sessions to a particular length and width of cart. Instead, the cartridge sits atop the battery which makes it so that you can use a wide variety of atomizers and cartridges.
The Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery is not made for specific consumers. In fact, it encourages owners to try out other types of materials because of its wide coil and atomizer compatibility.
View All
Close
key_features_description:
Alloy Body Design
510-Threaded Connection
400mAh Battery
Variable Voltage Settings
Pre-Heat Setting
As the name suggests, it’s a 510-threaded battery that accepts a wide variety of coils and cartridges without asking owners and consumers to go through unnecessary steps.
In addition, the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery is also equipped with simple controls that are fine-tuned to make vaping a seamless experience. Powering the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery is a 400mAh battery with variable voltage setting. It also features pre-heat setting for when you need to consume oils and other light and loose extracts. What’s striking about the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery is its alloy build which not only improves its looks but also gives it a premium feel.
Do you want to know more about the Yocan LUX 510 Threaded Vape Pen Battery? Check out our detailed spec sheet to find out if this is the right vaporizer for you.

title: Smok Novo 4 Kit
brand: SMOKTech Vape Tanks, Kits, Coils and More
summary: The Novo 4 from SmokTech reserves the delicacy and accessibility of the Novo Series but promotes itself to a functional pod system with some fresh, new features. The air-inlet ring facilitates the customization of flavor and vapor, the leak-proof coil...
description:
The Novo 4 from SmokTech reserves the delicacy and accessibility of the Novo Series but promotes itself to a functional pod system with some fresh, new features. The air-inlet ring facilitates the customization of flavor and vapor, the leak-proof coil design makes a messy cleanup and wasting of liquid a thing of the past, and lastly, the USB Type-C charging port contributes to optimizing the charging efficiency of the device. You are sure to have a more gratifying vaping experience with the Novo 4 than any other Novo device.
Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!
Latest Leak-Proof Technology
Air-Inlet Ring
Max 25W Output
Internal 800mAh Battery
PLEASE MORE THAN ONE SENSE SIMULTANEOUSLY - There is no one formula for innovation. The Novo 4 makes an immediate impact on the traditional pod system with all-around features, stylish appearance, and compact style.
FAST AND FUN TO ADJUST THE AIRFLOW - Scroll through air vents in different sizes by turning the air-inlet ring and finding the value which satisfies your demand for the tightness of the flavor and thickness of the vapor most.
TEXTURED ZINC ALLOY FOR DURABILITY - Constructed with a certain hardness and toughness, the Novo 4 withstands the wear and collision in daily use.
specifications_description:
Size: 93.5mm x 26.5mm x 17.7mm
Weight: 51.7g
Battery Capacity: 800mAh internal
Power Range: 5W to 25W
Input Voltage: 3.3V to 4.2V
Output Voltage: 0.5V to 4.0V
Standby Current: <50uA
Resistance Range: 0.4Ω to 3.0Ω
Charging Current: 5V±0.2V
Charging Voltage: Max 0.74A
Overcharge Voltage: 4.3V±0.05V
Overcharge Current: 2A±0.6A
Over-discharge Voltage: 2.4V±0.05V
SMOK NOVO 4 COILS CLICK HERE
SMOK NOVO 4 REPLACEMENT PODS CLICK HERE
EVERYTHING READY WITH A CLICK - The one button to rule them all design fulfills a concise style. The distinction between the powering on, powering off, and power adjustment is the frequency of clicking. To power the device on and off, simply press the button 5 times. Click the power button 2/3 times to start the power adjustment and increase by 0.5W with every click after.
MAX 25W OUTPUT - With an output ranging between 5W and 25W, the Novo 4 is here to cater to your picky tastes, whether you prefer a mild or strong one.
NO MORE LEAKAGE - When inserting the new LP1 Series Coil into the pod, the added silicone ring on the bottom of the coil fills in for any possible gap, effectively stemming the liquid leaking from the pod that results in a messy vaping experience and sticky hands! No one likes sticky hands.
WIDER CONTACT AREA, RAPID HEATING, BETTER TASTE - When the meshed coil gets in touch with the saturated cotton, delightful taste with smooth flavor and rich vapor arises spontaneously.
LP1 Meshed 0.8Ω Coil
Best at 12W
Works on a leak-proof vaping experience.
Meshed coil for a softer flavor.
LP1 DC 0.8Ω MTL Coil
Rated 12W to 25W
Works on a leak-proof vaping experience.
Less vapor and intense flavor.
LP1 DC 1.0Ω MTL Coil
Rated 10W to 15W
Works on a leak-proof vaping experience.
Strong throat-hit and excellent MTL taste.
IT IS ALWAYS POWERFUL - The integrated 800mAh battery leads to enduring vaping any time of day.
DEVOTE YOURSELF TO A FANTASTIC TIME - Recover the battery life on the Novo 4 in just 90 minutes with the USB Type-C 0.74A fast-charging port. No more dead battery anxiety!
INTELLIGENT DETECTION - Smart detection helps to better understand the device status. Protections include pod detection, short circuit protection, 8 seconds cut-off, and low voltage protections.

summary: SMOK and OFRF collaborated to bring forth the nexMESH Pod kit, a compact all-in-one pod mod. The SMOK NexMesh Pod Kit is powered by large 1200mAh inbuilt battery, and comes with two conical nexMesh coils for amazing flavor. Please check out the SMOK...
description:
SMOK and OFRF collaborated to bring forth the nexMESH Pod kit, a compact all-in-one pod mod. The SMOK NexMesh Pod Kit is powered by large 1200mAh inbuilt battery, and comes with two conical nexMesh coils for amazing flavor.
Please check out the
SMOK NexMesh Pod Kit
with the simple and elegant appearance. The nexMESH Pod kit  is a compact all-in-one pod mod jointly launched by Smok and OFRF. The SMOK NexMESH
Pod system
is made of a unique aluminum alloy shell that is lightweight and durable. With the large 1200mAh inbuilt battery
in small size, the SMOK NexMESH Pod kit can provide maximum power up to 30 Watts. It is worth mentioning that you can press the UP/DOWN button to adjust the required power and get the preferred effect.
And the SMOK NexMESH Pod cartridge possesses two types core, 0.4ohm SS316 nexMESH Coil/0.4ohm DC nexMESH Coil, for your seclection. What is more, the Conical nexMesh core heating element is designed to deliver fuller and richer taste, taking flavor-chasing to a new high level. In addition, the SMOK NexMESH Pod features a waterproof cartridge base for preventing condensation from entering the interior. In short, the SMOK NexMESH Pod kit is not only suitable for DTL vaping but also MTL vaping. Just get the SMOK NexMESH Pod kit and enjoy the fuller and richer flavor.

title: Vapmod Vmod 2 Battery
summary: The VAPMOD V-MOD 2 is a super compact vaporizer that utilizes concentrate oil cartridges, with a sleek design reminiscent of the iPod. VapmodTech has invented their best seller V-Mod with the new second version. The main...
description:
The VAPMOD V-MOD 2 is a super compact vaporizer that utilizes concentrate oil cartridges, with a sleek design reminiscent of the iPod. VapmodTech has invented their best seller V-Mod with the new second version. The main difference between V-Mod and V-Mod 2 is that the second version has haptic feedback, that notifies once preheat function is ready to use. Other than that V-Mod 2 has the same features such as long-lasting integrated 900mAh battery with variable voltage from 2.6V to 4.0V, 510 thread magnetic connection, preheat mode and pass-through charging through Micro-USB port.
The VAPMOD V-MOD 2 has a sleek, minimalist design with single-button for intuitive operation. At just less than two inches by two inches and slightly more than half-inch thick, this is a super portable unit with ample battery life. V-Mod 2 has 510 thread connection with the magnetic ring and is compatible with all mini oil cartridges up to 10mm wide between 0.5 and 3.0 Ohm. The voltage can be adjusted between 2.6V (Green), 3.2V (Yellow), and 4.0V (Red) by clicking the button 3 times. The device also uses the color indicator for the battery life: green - 70% or more, yellow - 30% to 70%, and red means less than 30% battery life left. To use the device in the Preheat Mode, tap the button twice and the power button will flash repeatedly while it warms up the cartridge, to deactivate Preheat mode, simply press the button once. If you hold the button continuously the V-Mod will work in the normal mode with the direct output. V-Mod can be charged via the micro USB charging port with the adapter 0.5-1.0A.
VAPMOD VMod 2 vaporizer offers the ultimate pocket-friendly oil vaping experience, delivering smooth rips with a super compact design that won't blow your cover.
Note:
This device is designed for herbal concentrates and is not intended to be used with any other media.
key_features_description:

summary: The Vaporesso GT Mesh Replacement Coil is one of the most innovative coils on the market today. Designed to be compatible with most Vaporesso sub-ohm tanks, this coil improves flavor and vapor production while boasting impressive longevity. Mesh material...
description:
The Vaporesso GT Mesh Replacement Coil is one of the most innovative coils on the market today. Designed to be compatible with most Vaporesso sub-ohm tanks, this coil improves flavor and vapor production while boasting impressive longevity. Mesh material ensures an even distribution of heat that improves your vaping sessions in every way. The resistance level of 0.18-ohms operates most efficiently when the wattage of your vaping device is set between 65 and 75. These coils won't burn out after just a few uses. This is because of the mesh material that increases the heating surface area. Plus, they are made with high-quality organic cotton that distributes your e-liquid evenly.
Recommended Wattage: 65-75W (0.18ohm)

summary: Nitecore UI2 Dual-Slot Portable Charger The UI2 is a portable dual-slot USB battery charger with a single-slot max output of 0.8A, capable of charging 2 batteries simultaneously and controlling each slot independently while available for large-sized...
description:
Nitecore UI2 Dual-Slot Portable Charger

The UI2 is a portable dual-slot USB battery charger with a single-slot max output of 0.8A, capable of charging 2 batteries simultaneously and controlling each slot independently while available for large-sized 20700, 21700 Li-ion batteries and more. It has multiple charging safeguards with a weight of only 79.5g (2.8oz), enabling users to enjoy inexhaustible power supply on the go. For more detailed information from the manufacturer, click
here
.
Max charging current of 800mA
Intelligent charging mode selection (CC and CV)
Lightweight and portable for outdoor charging
Charges large-sized batteries like 20700, 21700 batteries & more
Micro-USB port is compatible with USB adapters, solar panels, power banks, and more
Displays real-time battery level and charging status
DUAL-SLOT LITHIUM BATTERY CHARGER - Powerful and compact, the NITECORE UI2 is a dual-slot portable USB Li-ion battery charger capable of reaching a maximum charging current of 800mA and supports 18650, 18350, 20700, 21700 etc many type and size lithium batteries.
SAFE AND INTELLIGENT CHARGING - Its power indicator provides users with real-time battery level and charging status. It also provides multiple charging safeguards to prevent from reverse polarity, overcharge, and overheating.
PORTABLE USB CHARGING - The UI2 features a micro-USB port compatible with various power sources including power banks, solar panels and USB adapters for quick and efficient charging. Weighing 2.8 ounces, the lightweight design of the UI2 allows you to carry this charger everywhere you go. Measuring 4.94 inches, the UI2 fits comfortably in the palm of your hand and is portable for outdoor applications.

summary:
VAPMOD V-Mod 900mAh

The VAPMOD V-Mod is a super compact thick oil/wax vaporizer kit with a sleek design reminiscent of the iPod. It has a sleek, minimalist design featuring a single button for intuitive operation. The kit comes...
description:
VAPMOD V-Mod 900mAh
TANK NOT INCLUDED

The VAPMOD V-Mod is a super compact thick oil/wax vaporizer kit with a sleek design reminiscent of the iPod. It has a sleek, minimalist design featuring a single button for intuitive operation. The kit comes with a 510 thread screw on magnetic connector ring. You can adjust the voltage between 2.6V (Green), 3.2V (Yellow), and 4.0V (Red) by clicking the button 3 times. The unit also uses the colors to indicate its battery life. Green means 70% or more, Yellow is between 30% and 70%, and red means less than 30% battery life left. You can also preheat a cartridge by pressing the button twice. At just less than 2 inches by 2 inches and slightly more than 1/2 inch thick, this is a very compact well designed unit with ample battery life to keep you going!

title: Vapmod Magic 710 Box Mod
summary: Vapmod presents the Magic 710 Herbal Concentrate Vaporizer, a discreet battery for 510 threaded herbal concentrate cartridges. It features an M7 magnetic adapter, 380mAh battery, and a constant 3.5V output. The Magic 710 utilizes a button free,...
description:
Vapmod presents the Magic 710 Herbal Concentrate Vaporizer, a discreet battery for 510 threaded herbal concentrate cartridges. It features an M7 magnetic adapter, 380mAh battery, and a constant 3.5V output. The Magic 710 utilizes a button free, draw-activated system with a magnetic adapter connection that fits up to 11mm diameter cartridges. This battery has a fixed 3.5V constant output and an atomizer resistance of 1.0 to 3.0 ohm. The Magic can be charged with a micro USB port at the bottom of the device. A red LED light at the base of the device indicates charging and turns off when full. The Magic 710 comes with overcharge protection, over discharge protection, over current protection, short circuit protection, and over voltage protection.

title: Yocan Uni Box Mod
summary: The Yocan UNI is an innovative VV Box MOD with small and discreet appearance. Working with built-in 650mAh battery and adjustable three levels voltage indicator light, the Yocan UNI MOD can bring you stable vaping experience. The mainly...
description:
The
Yocan UNI

is an innovative VV Box MOD with small and discreet appearance. Working with built-in 650mAh battery and adjustable three levels voltage indicator light, the Yocan UNI MOD can bring you stable vaping experience. The mainly distinctive feature of the UNI is that it comes with the adjustable knobs located just right beneath the lips of the cartridge chamber. You don't have to worry if the atomizer is too tall or too short. The UNI will let you adjust the height of any oil atomizer.
Plus the adjustable atomizer holder fitting different diameters, the Yocan UNI MOD is incredibly the world's first MOD that is universal for any types of oil cartridge. To provide you with an incredible experience, the UNI has a built-in preheat function that warms up your oils before the first use. Rapidly clicking the power button two times will put the device in preheat mode for 10s. To deactivate the preheating function, simply press the power button 2 times again.

title: Yocan Evolve Plus XL Kit
summary: The all new Yocan Evolve Plus XL is a thorough rework of the blockbuster Evolve Plus.  There isn't anything that carries directly over from the original.  The battery jumps more than 25% to 1400mAh to power the all new QUAD Quartz Rod Coil...
description:
The all new Yocan Evolve Plus XL is a thorough rework of the blockbuster
Evolve Plus

.  There isn't anything that carries directly over from the original.  The battery jumps more than 25% to 1400mAh to power the all new QUAD Quartz Rod Coil.  It uses 4 stainless steel wrapped quartz rod coils to give you huge eNail like hits.  The mouthpiece connection is magnetic for the added convenience and you can now control the airflow to really personalize your experience.  The built in silicone jar was reworked and is now removable and has two separate compartments.  There are several new colors including Luminous, which glows in the dark when exposed to sunlight.  There is also a removable hanging ring and lanyard to make carrying it with you a breeze.  They even redesigned the included loading tool to improve your experience.
Caution:  The included loading tool is simply a tool to load a vape pen.  The tool is not meant to be heated in any way.  Applying heat to this tool may result in damage and injury.
In the Box:

1 Evolve Plus XL 1400mAh Battery
2 QUAD Quartz Coil (1 Pre-Installed)
